attributes.action: Stop collection of domestic waste during the morning commute to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the collection of domestic waste was delayed until after morning rush hour i.e. 9:30am, this will help to stop traffic build up on inner city roads thus reducing pollution and carbon emisions from cars. This will also make it safer for children walking to school and crossing roads congested with traffic waiting behind collection trucks.
